org.fruit.alayer

Class Pen

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.fruit.alayer.Pen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public abstract class Pen
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    A pen is used to draw on a Canvas object. It determines attributes such as line width, color and fill pattern.
    See Also:
    Canvas, Serialized Form

      • darken

        public static Color darken(Color base,
                           double percent)
        Retrieves a darker color.
        Parameters:
        base - The base color.
        percent - The darken percent in the range 0.0 (black) .. 1.0 (base).
        Returns:
        The darker color.
